lead_paragraph: CLUB In Mexico, the country’s most popular club, Chivas Guadalajara, extended the winless streak of the richest, Club América, to 10 games with a 3-2 victory on Sunday. Host Chivas built a 3-0 lead at Jalisco Stadium and played with a man advantage for the final 35 minutes after Juan Carlos Silva was red carded. But América’s Salvador Cabañas scored two late goals in a four-minute span.
